mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs Frances Weeks
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs Frances Weeks Offense: Assault and Battery with metal knuckles Victim and Complainant: R.L. Ballard Guilty: Court Cost: $6.00, Fine: $5.00 Felony Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 12.25.1887 Robert Weeks paid $150.00 for recognizance
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
